Html:
Hi,

I just start using PHPWord.

Could anyone manage to use tab in their document?

I read the classes and it setTabPos() in PHPWord/Writer/Word2007/Document.php and Style/TOC.php

and I am wondering can I use setTabPos() and how do I use it?

Thanks.

I'm sorry, but tab handling isn't implented yet.

The only part where tabs are used is the TOC (table of content) part, to align the page numbers.
